name: The Purr Reaper
description:
This was a submission for the GameDev.tv Game Jam 2022

Theme: Death is only the Beginning

The story is that you are playing as the Grim Reaper's Cat. As the Grim Reaper is departing for a day of reaping souls, he drops a paper with a target for the day. To keep your loving owner out of trouble for missing a soul, you decide to take care of that one for the grim reaper. Now you have to traverse through a world and take care of the soul.

Your target decided to wear a Top hat this day, in the top floor of the Office in front of the pipe. Make your way there but remember to use your alternating forms and possession to get their safely. 

Huge thanks to Caffeine_Ted for help with the character design and many of the 2D sprites!

Controls: 

WASD + Space + Shift for regular movement

E: Change forms

F: Possess and Escape bodies

The original release had a lot of bugs that I just never noticed so I did a quick patch and implemented stuff that I had made but forgot to put in the main scene.
